verses.verse: Then<WG5119> came<WG4334> to Jesus<WG2424> scribes<WG1122> and Pharisees,<WG5330> which<WG3588> were of Jerusalem,<WG2414> saying,<WG3004>
Why<WG1302> do your disciples<WG3101> transgress<WG3845> the tradition<WG3862> of the elders?<WG4245> for they wash<WG3538> not their hands<WG5495> when<WG3752> they eat<WG2068> bread.<WG740>
But he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to them, Why<WG1302> do you also<WG2532> transgress<WG3845> the commandment<WG1785> of God<WG2316> by your<WG5216> tradition? <WG3862>

For God<WG2316> commanded,<WG1781> saying,<WG3004> Honor<WG5091> your father<WG3962> and mother:<WG3384> and, He that curses<WG2551> father<WG3962> or<WG2228> mother,<WG3384> let him die<WG5053> the death. <WG2288>

But you say,<WG3004> Whoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall say<WG2036> to his father<WG3962> or <WG2228> his mother, <WG3384> It is a gift,<WG1435> by whatever <WG3739> <WG1437> you might be profited<WG5623> by me;

And honor<WG5091> not his father<WG3962> or<WG2228> his mother, <WG3384> he shall be free. Thus<WG2532> have you made<WG208> the commandment<WG1785> of God<WG2316> of none<WG208> effect<WG208> by your<WG5216> tradition. <WG3862>
You hypocrites,<WG5273> well<WG2573> did Esaias<WG2268> prophesy<WG4395> of you, saying, <WG3004>
This<WG3778> people<WG2992> draws near<WG1448> to me with their mouth,<WG4750> and honors<WG5091> me with their lips;<WG5491> but their heart<WG2588> is far<WG4206> from me.
But in vain<WG3155> they do worship<WG4576> me, teaching <WG1321> for doctrines<WG1319> the commandments<WG1778> of men. <WG444>
And he called<WG4341> the multitude,<WG3793> and said<WG2036> to them, Hear,<WG191> and understand: <WG4920>
Not that which goes<WG1525> into<WG1519> the mouth<WG4750> defiles<WG2840> a man;<WG444> but that which comes<WG1607> out of the mouth,<WG4750> this<WG5124> defiles<WG2840> a man. <WG444>
Then<WG5119> came<WG4334> his disciples,<WG3101> and said<WG2036> to him, Know<WG1492> you that the Pharisees<WG5330> were offended,<WG4624> after they heard<WG191> this<WG3588> saying?<WG3056>
But he answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> Every<WG3956> plant,<WG5451> which<WG3739> my heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> has not planted,<WG5452> shall be rooted<WG1610> up.

Let them alone:<WG863> they be blind<WG5185> leaders<WG3595> of the blind.<WG5185> And if<WG1437> the blind<WG5185> lead<WG3594> the blind,<WG5185> both<WG297> shall fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> the ditch. <WG999>
Then<WG1161> answered<WG611> Peter<WG4074> and said<WG2036> to him, Declare<WG5419> to us this<WG5026> parable.<WG3850>
And Jesus<WG2424> said,<WG2036> Are you also<WG2532> yet<WG188> without<WG801> understanding? <WG801>

Do not you yet<WG3768> understand,<WG3539> that whatever<WG3956> enters<WG1531> in at<WG1519> the mouth<WG4750> goes<WG5562> into<WG1519> the belly,<WG2836> and is cast<WG1544> out into<WG1519> the draught? <WG856>
But those<WG3588> things which<WG3588> proceed<WG1607> out of the mouth<WG4750> come<WG1831> forth<WG1831> from the heart;<WG2588> and they defile<WG2840> the man. <WG444>

For out of the heart<WG2588> proceed<WG1831> evil<WG4190> thoughts,<WG1261> murders,<WG5408> adulteries,<WG3430> fornications,<WG4202> thefts,<WG2829> false<WG5577> witness,<WG5577> blasphemies: <WG988>
These<WG5023> are the things which<WG3588> defile<WG2840> a man:<WG444> but to eat<WG5315> with unwashed<WG449> hands<WG5495> defiles<WG2840> not a man. <WG444>
Then<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1831> there,<WG1564> and departed<WG402> into<WG1519> the coasts<WG3313> of Tyre<WG5184> and Sidon.<WG4605>

And, behold,<WG2400> a woman<WG1135> of Canaan<WG5478> came<WG1831> out of the same<WG1565> coasts,<WG3725> and cried<WG2905> to him, saying,<WG3004> Have mercy<WG1653> on me, O Lord,<WG2962> you son<WG5207> of David;<WG1138> my daughter<WG2364> is grievously<WG2560> vexed<WG1139> with a devil.<WG1139>
But he answered<WG611> her not a word.<WG3056> And his disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> and sought<WG2065> him, saying,<WG3004> Send<WG630> her away;<WG630> for she cries<WG2896> after<WG3693> us.
But he answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> I am not sent<WG649> but to the lost<WG622> sheep<WG4263> of the house<WG3624> of Israel. <WG2474>
Then<WG1161> came<WG2064> she and worshipped<WG4352> him, saying,<WG3004> Lord,<WG2962> help<WG997> me.
But he answered<WG611> and said,<WG2036> It is not meet<WG2570> to take<WG2983> the children's<WG5043> bread,<WG740> and to cast <WG906> it to dogs. <WG2952>
And she said,<WG2036> Truth,<WG3483> Lord:<WG2962> yet<WG1063> the dogs<WG2952> eat<WG2068> of the crumbs<WG5589> which<WG3588> fall<WG4098> from their masters'<WG2962> table.<WG5132>

Then<WG5119> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to her, O woman,<WG1135> great <WG3173> is your faith:<WG4102> be it to you even as you will. <WG2309> And her daughter<WG2364> was made<WG2390> whole<WG2390> from that very<WG1565> hour.<WG5610>

And Jesus<WG2424> departed<WG3327> from there,<WG1564> and came<WG2064> near<WG3844> to the sea<WG2281> of Galilee;<WG1056> and went<WG305> up into<WG1519> a mountain,<WG3735> and sat<WG2521> down<WG2521> there.<WG1563>

And great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> came<WG4334> to him, having<WG2192> with them those that were lame,<WG5560> blind,<WG5185> dumb,<WG2974> maimed,<WG2948> and many<WG4183> others,<WG2087> and cast<WG4496> them down<WG4496> at<WG3844> Jesus'<WG2424> feet;<WG4228> and he healed<WG2323> them:

So that<WG5620> the multitude<WG3793> wondered,<WG2296> when they saw<WG991> the dumb<WG2974> to speak,<WG2980> the maimed<WG2948> to be whole,<WG5199> the lame<WG5560> to walk,<WG4043> and the blind<WG5185> to see:<WG991> and they glorified<WG1392> the God<WG2316> of Israel.<WG2474>

Then<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> called<WG4341> his disciples<WG3101> to him, and said,<WG2036> I have compassion<WG4697> on<WG1909> the multitude,<WG3793> because<WG3754> they continue<WG4357> with me now<WG2235> three<WG5140> days,<WG2250> and have<WG2192> nothing <WG3756> <WG5100> to eat:<WG5315> and I will<WG2309> not send<WG630> them away<WG630> fasting,<WG3523> lest<WG3379> they faint<WG1590> in the way. <WG3598>

And his disciples<WG3101> say<WG3004> to him, From where<WG4159> should we have so<WG5118> much<WG5118> bread<WG740> in the wilderness,<WG2047> as to fill<WG5526> so<WG5118> great<WG5118> a multitude?<WG3793>
And Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them, How<WG4214> many<WG4214> loaves<WG740> have<WG2192> you? And they said,<WG2036> Seven,<WG2033> and a few<WG3641> little<WG2485> fishes.<WG2485>
And he commanded<WG2753> the multitude<WG3793> to sit<WG377> down<WG377> on<WG1909> the ground.<WG1093>

And he took<WG2983> the seven<WG2033> loaves<WG740> and the fishes,<WG2486> and gave<WG1325> thanks,<WG2168> and broke<WG2806> them, and gave<WG1325> to his disciples,<WG3101> and the disciples<WG3101> to the multitude.<WG3793>
And they did all<WG3956> eat,<WG5315> and were filled:<WG5526> and they took<WG142> up of the broken<WG2801> meat that was left<WG4052> seven<WG2033> baskets<WG4711> full.<WG4134>
And they that did eat<WG2068> were four<WG5070> thousand<WG5070> men,<WG435> beside<WG5565> women<WG1135> and children.<WG3813>
And he sent<WG630> away<WG630> the multitude,<WG3793> and took<WG1684> <WG1519> ship,<WG4143> and came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the coasts<WG3725> of Magdala.<WG3093>
